name: CCS enrolment - 2 - Apply for credit card service

prompts.value: What service do you want to apply?

messages.speech:
You will have to complete the Credit/Debit card enrolment form attached with copy of NRIC (front and back) and submit it to us at least 2 weeks before your premium due date. The form is available PRUaccess Plus Website. (https://pruaccessplus.prudential.com.my/pap/general/public_pamb_form.do?formClassificationId=form.classification.2)

Yes, only Original Credit/Debit card Enrollment form & Direct Debit Authorization form is accepted. We are accepting orginal and also the email copy for Credit/Debit Card enrolment.

Only Visa & Master Credit/debit card is accepted.
